## Who We Are

We are a technical and research-focused unit dedicated to the development, evaluation, and dissemination of tools and insights for applied economic analysis.

## Our Mission

Our mission is to support decision-making and foster technical collaboration by producing robust models, clear documentation, and accessible research outputs.

## What We Do

We work on the design and implementation of analytical frameworks, model-based simulations, and empirical projects related to economic dynamics.

## Who It's For

This website is intended for researchers, analysts, and institutions interested in macroeconomic modeling, forecasting, and applied time series tools.

## What You Will Find Here

- Theoretical and technical materials  
- Code libraries and implementation guides  
- Forecasting results and research outputs  
- Presentations, downloads, and supporting files  
- Information about the team and our collaborators

## Collaborations

We engage with internal and external partners to share methodologies, co-develop tools, and advance the understanding of key economic phenomena.

## Contact

For questions or collaboration inquiries, please visit the [team section](../team.qmd).
